original: intros m m0 n l H H0. intros H1 H2. unfold not. intros H3. unfold filterMap. induction l as [| [n' m'] l' IHl']. - contradiction. - simpl. destruct (pt_map_name_msg m' n' m0 m). + intros H4. apply H1 in H4. inversion H4. + apply IHl'. * intros nm H5. apply H1. right. apply H5. * intros H6. apply H2. right. apply H6. * intros contra. apply H2. left. reflexivity. * apply H3.
